attributes.action: issue our uk passports as early as possible for us back to work!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DEAR GORDON AND ALL:
     YOUR E-MAIL WINDOW IS UNDER MAINTENANCE. SO I TRY THIS WINDOW.
     THANK YOU FOR YOUR SPEECH ABOUT LOW CARBON ECONOMY. THERE IS ONE POINT WE MUST EMPHASIZE THAT BIG INVESTMENT IN SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT AND COMMERCIALIZATION MUST BE ACCOMPANIED WITH INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY PROTECTION LIKE PATENTS REGISTRATION TO ENCOURAGE ENTHUSIASTIC SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNOLOGICAL DEVELOPMENT. WITH A VIEW TO OUR WIDE RANGE OF DEVELOPMENT PLANS, I THINK THAT THE PATENTS WOULD BE FLOURISHING SO MANY THAT THE COMPUTER SYSTEMS IN THE PATENT OFFICE WOULD HAVE TO BE IMPROVED MUCH TO SUIT SUCH FLOURISHING AND BOOMING. YES, WE ARE BUILDING THE FUTURE FOR OUR CHILDREN AND THE WORLD. LEGISLATIONS OF ALL FIELDS WOULD HAVE TO BE KEPT REVISING FOR NEW CHALLENGES OF ALL FIELDS. OF COURSE, WE WOULD INVEST AFTER FEASIBILITY BE DONE VERY WELL.     THANKS!

            KARL AND ANNA AND FAMILY

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
